patterns.name: Regex with nested quantifiers (ReDoS)
patterns.description: Regex with nested quantifiers can cause exponential backtracking (ReDoS)

remediation.title: Avoid nested quantifiers
suggestions: Simplify regex to avoid nested quantifiers like (a+)+
Use atomic groups or possessive quantifiers if supported
Set timeout for regex execution in production
Test regex with long inputs to detect exponential behavior
Consider using dedicated parsing libraries for complex formats

patterns.name: Regex with overlapping alternatives
patterns.description: Regex with overlapping alternatives can cause catastrophic backtracking

remediation.title: Optimize regex alternatives
suggestions: Order alternatives from most specific to least specific
Test regex performance with long inputs
Consider using string operations instead of regex for simple cases
